create.endWithSaveBtn: Save draft and back to the E-Services

eserviceNameField.label: E-Service name (required)
eserviceNameField.infoLabel: If you have more than one E-Service with the same name, give a little hint to tell them apart (e.g. "TARI â€“ for Municipalities" e "TARI - for Regions")

eserviceDescriptionField.label: E-Service description (required)
eserviceDescriptionField.infoLabel: (e.g. "Dedicated to the bodies that need ...", or "This E-Service is for ...")

certified.label: Certified
certified.description: These attributes are certified by an authoritative source. They do not require further checks

verified.label: Verified
verified.description: These attributes could have already been verified by other bodies. You can decide whether to verify them yourself anyway

declared.label: Declared
declared.description: When the Subscriber sends a subscription request, they declare to possess these attributes under their exclusive responsibility. No further checks are required

audienceField.label: Audience (required)
audienceField.infoLabel: The content of this field will the audience (aud) that the Subscriber will send you inside the access token. With this id the Subscriber will tell the Provider which service it is looking for

dailyCallsPerConsumerField.label: API calls/day threshold for each Subscriber (required)
dailyCallsPerConsumerField.infoLabel: The Subscriber declares its API calls estimate for each purpose. If the sum of the calls of all purposes will be over this threshold, you will have to approve manually each new purpose before it can be used to access your E-Service

dailyCallsTotalField.label: Total API calls/day threshold (required)
dailyCallsTotalField.infoLabel: The total API calls that will be allowed per day, shared among all the Subscribers. If the sum of new purposes will go above this threshold, you will have to approve manually each new purpose before it can be used to access your E-Service

validation.min: This value cannot be below the threshold set for the API calls/day for each Subscriber

documentation.title: Documentation
documentation.description: Upload the technical documents that can help implement the use of this E-Service

quickPublish.title: Quick publish options
quickPublish.description: If you are done editing, you can publish this draft immediately, or delete it. If you want to publish later, just save the draft above or leave this page

tableEServiceCatalog.missingCertifiedAttributes: Your party does not meet the list of required certificated attributes

subscribeModal.title: Fruition request
subscribeModal.description: You are about to send a fruition request for the {{name}} E-Service, version {{version}}
